answers.answer: I'd call just to be sure it wont hurt if ou.do. Dizziness and sickness can be.signs of preeclampsia def worth being.checked

No idea if it's the same thing or not, but around 30 weeks before baby dropped, the only way I could tell if I was hungry was by being lightheaded or shaky.  Every now and then I'll feel the same way for a couple days here and there, if you feel like you can make it to your doctor's appointment I would wait :)
Yeah, you need to call lady, there are too many possibilities with pregnancy. Something you shouldnt risk.
Okay I will thank you. And I had thought it was from not eating since I have problens with my blood sugar dropping but it is even after I eat
It would be best to call, but could be hot flashes as Well

question: Im 34+2 and feel extremely nauseous as well as extremely dizzy. I cant drive, I can barely walk or move without feeling like I am going to pass out. I have water with me constantly so im not dehydrated. I have an appointment Friday. Shoulf I call or wait? Anyone else experience this?
title: anyone else have this?
